game.name: Funus: The Climb
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Travel across a fantasy world full of story choices, consequences and platforming... A LOT OF PLATFORMING! Discover the unique combination of challenging jumps and story progression as you alter the course of a universe. A game by Necrit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Travel across a fantasy world full of story choices, consequences and platforming... A LOT OF PLATFORMING! Discover the unique combination of challenging jumps and story progression as you alter the course of a universe. A game by Necrit.
